active_learning.discussion_prompt: How would you apply this concept in your work environment?
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, assign each partner one of the four IDPS classes (Network-Based, Wireless, NBA, Host-Based). The teacher explains the class using a hand-drawn diagram, key NIST SP 800-94 characteristics, and deployment considerations; the partner quizzes with 3 questions and teaches back to confirm understanding.
active_learning.problem_solving: In groups, given a real-world scenario (e.g., an e-commerce site facing DDoS attacks and remote access needs), design an IPS deployment plan: select IDPS class(es), justify per NIST SP 800-94, simulate traffic analysis steps, integrate with firewalls/zero-trust, and present trade-offs.
